actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Lewis and Clark Trail, located in portions of Missouri, Kansas, Nebraska, Iowa, South Dakota, North Dakota, Montana, Idaho, Oregon and Washington as a component of the National Trails System.
short_title: Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail Act

summary.text: Lewis and Clark National Historical Trail Act - Amends the National Trails System Act to establish the Lewis and Clark Trail within Federal lands located in Missouri, Kansas, Nebraska, Iowa, South Dakota, North Dakota, Montana, Idaho, Oregon, and Washington. Provides for the inclusion of State, local, and privately-held lands. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to administer the lands designated under this Act.

titles.title: Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail Act

A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Lewis and Clark Trail, located in portions of Missouri, Kansas, Nebraska, Iowa, South Dakota, North Dakota, Montana, Idaho, Oregon and Washington as a component of the National Trails System.
